name: Dear Elonai
storyline:
Play as Everett, a scientist that lost his love in the most important day in his career: the presentation of your discoveries on the multiverse travel. After years of research, Everett finds a way to use that discovery to, instead of travelling across the multiverse, travel in time. Now he'll use that power for the first time and try to stop his love life death by reviving the last few moments before it all happened.

Keep traveling back in time and doing things differently each time, while you try to solve the mystery behind hear death and try to stop it from happening over and over again.
summary: Travel back in time in Dear Elonai, a noir point and click game and try to avoid the death of your love live.
